font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n 倾向，偏好： a natural propensity or inclination; predisposition
【例】 showed artistic proclivities at an early age 在很小的时候就表现除了对艺术的喜好
【近】 aptitude, disposition, leaning, partiality, penchant嗜好；倾向, predilection, propensity
【反】 aversion, antipathy, disinclination 厌恶，反感
【记】 "a tendency, predisposition, propensity," from proclivis "prone to," literally "sloping, inclined," from pro- "forward" (see pro-) + clivus "a slope,"
【另】 acclivity 向上的斜坡；declivity 下坡，倾斜，proclivity 倾向，偏好
